scenario.name: Registration Load Test
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0]@[service] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Route: <sip:[service];transport=[transport];lr> Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[service]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[service]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: Accession 4.0.0.0 Supported: outbound, path Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport];ob>;+sip.ice;reg-id=1;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:00000000-0000-0000-0000-[field1]>" Expires: 3600 Allow: PRACK, INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, MESSAGE, OPTIONS Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[field0]@[service] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Route: <sip:[service];transport=[transport];lr> Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[service]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[service]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: Accession 4.0.0.0 Supported: outbound, path Contact: <sip:[field0]@[$nat_ip_addr]:[$nat_port];transport=[transport];ob>;+sip.ice;reg-id=1;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:00000000-0000-0000-0000-[field1]>" Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport];ob>;expires=0;+sip.ice;reg-id=1;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:00000000-0000-0000-0000-[field1]>" Expires: 3600 Allow: PRACK, INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, MESSAGE, OPTIONS Content-Length: 0
